item.title: About Eric Peña
item.description: I am a Complex Systems Science graduate student and Clifford D. Clark Diversity Fellow at State University of New York at Binghamton. Email: eric.pena@binghamton.edu Twitter: @ericpenaphysics Experience Statistics and Probability Teacher, SUNY Binghamton Net Revenue Management Data Analyst, Diageo Engineer, H.B. Fuller Physics Teacher, OSU Physics Physics Demonstrations Assistant, OSU Physics Projects A ‘Life’ Worth Mentioning: Conway’s Game of Life Mean Information Game Bayesian Sparse Network Reconstruction Cellular Automata Optimization using Genetic Algorithm Education M.
